Provided offshore bathymetry and land topography.</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>Bathymetric  information was acquired from the NOAA National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC). A custom bathymetric dataset was produced using the GEODAS Grid Translator available at the NGDC website. The downloaded data was converted into ARCINFO GRID format for further geoprocessing in ArcGIS. Additional geoprocessing within ArcGIS consisted on: exporting the dataset to ASCII raster. Then, the ASCII file was read by a Excel for the generation of the CELL.INP file  (specifying grid cell organization and type) required by the EFDC model.</procdesc> <procdate>201006</procdate> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>Northern Gulf Institute</cntorg> <cntper>Dr. Vladimir Alarcon</cntper> </cntorgp> <cntpos>Assistant Research Professor</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype> <address>P.O.
